items: Stand in front of a bench or step with a dumbbell in each hand.
Place your right foot on the bench or step.
Push through your right heel and lift your body up onto the bench or step.
Bring your left foot up onto the bench or step.
Step back down with your left foot, then your right foot.
Repeat for desired number of reps, then switch sides and repeat.
Strengthens leg muscles, including quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes
Improves balance and stability
Increases cardiovascular endurance
Targets specific muscle imbalances or weaknesses
Can be modified for different fitness levels and goals
Requires minimal equipment and can be done at home or in the gym
Quadriceps
Glutes
Hamstrings
Calves
Core
